titles.title: O thou, my soul, forget no more

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O thou, my soul, forget no more The friend who all thy misery bore; Let every idol be forgot, But, O my soul, forget Him not.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus for thou a body takes, Thy guilt assumes, thy fetters breaks, Discharging all thy dreadful debt; And canst thou eâ€™er such love forget?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Renounce thy works and ways, with grief, And fly to this most sure relief; Nor Him forget, who left His throne, And for thy life gave up His own.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Eternal truth and mercy shine, In Him, and He Himself is thine: And canst thou, then, with sin beset, Such charms, such matchless charms, forget?
